charges.charge_description: 18 USC 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2) - Felon in Possession of Firearms(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months imprisonment (concurrent with count 2), 3 years supervised release with special conditions (concurrent with count 2), $100 special assessment, $500 fine (concurrent with count 2)

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 922(j) and 924(a)(2) - Possession of Stolen Firearms(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months imprisonment (concurrent with count 1), 3 years supervised release with special conditions (concurrent with count 1), $100 special assessment, $500 fine (concurrent with count 1)

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2) - Felon in Possession of a Firearm, 18 U.S.C. 922(j) and 924(a)(2) - Possession of Stolen Firearms
